about_the_game:
All-in-one video toolkit to convert, compress and edit your video & audio

The best free video converter helps you transfer media files to any of your desired video formats at ultra-fast speed. It automates converting HD/4K video to MP4, AVI, MOV, or any other format without losing its quality.

Also, it's an audio converter to extract audio from video and alter it into any format like MP3, M4A, MAV, M4R, AIFF, APE, FLAC, ACS, AAC, OGG, AMR, MP2, etc.

The built-in video compressor helps to reduce video file size quickly without losing its quality and makes your video/audio more sharable as well as saving much storage space.

Batch compression is supported. It's flexible to set up your lossless compression of video and audio files with compression rate, format, resolution, or Bitrate.

Instead of manually transcribe audio content for a video, it also supports to export the genereated subtitles to an SRT or TXT file, so that you can keep it for another video.

A slack video editor is built-in to create and edit video content as well as audio as simply as it could be. Perfect for video beginners of all levels. In a few clicks, a wonderful masterpiece rolls out.

Level up video content with simple tricks: trim, crop, cut, add subtitles, amazing effects or improve audio. Minutes later, a story-telling video comes out to capture the audience's attention and earn more likes or followers.

All-in-one video toolkit to convert, compress and edit your video & audio

The best free video converter helps you transfer media files to any of your desired video formats at ultra-fast speed. It automates converting HD/4K video to MP4, AVI, MOV, or any other format without losing its quality.

Also, it's an audio converter to extract audio from video and alter it into any format like MP3, M4A, MAV, M4R, AIFF, APE, FLAC, ACS, AAC, OGG, AMR, MP2, etc.

The built-in video compressor helps to reduce video file size quickly without losing its quality and makes your video/audio more sharable as well as saving much storage space.

Batch compression is supported. It's flexible to set up your lossless compression of video and audio files with compression rate, format, resolution, or Bitrate.

Instead of manually transcribe audio content for a video, it also supports to export the genereated subtitles to an SRT or TXT file, so that you can keep it for another video.

A slack video editor is built-in to create and edit video content as well as audio as simply as it could be. Perfect for video beginners of all levels. In a few clicks, a wonderful masterpiece rolls out.

name: EaseUS VideoKit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8.1/8/7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 500 MHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: All-in-one video toolkit to convert, compress and edit your video & audio
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
